As we are born, our bodies start to grow up and get stronger. We begin to age, or get older, from the moment of our birth. Every year, we celebrate our birthday and mark another year of life. The amount of years we live is called our life span. When we are young, our bodies are strong and healthy. As we get older, our bodies may start to change. We might feel tired or have aches and pains. Eventually, our bodies will slow down and we will become old. The good news is that our bodies can stay strong and healthy for many years.
